purpose: To streamline the development and deployment of multi-agent workflows, enhancing collaboration and efficiency across various applications.
principle: Fastagency operates on the principle of modularity, allowing developers to easily integrate and customize agent workflows tailored to specific tasks and environments.
reusability: The framework promotes reusability by providing a set of pre-built agents and workflows that can be easily adapted and reused across different projects.
limitations: As an alpha-level project, fastagency may have incomplete features and potential bugs. It may not yet support all use cases for complex multi-agent interactions.
name: fastagency
description: The fastest way to bring multi-agent workflows to production.
